refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cad_parea reads from input (standard input if not given) a series of polygon vertex (x,y) coordinate values and writes to output (standard output if not given) the polygon's area. Lines not beginning with a number are silently skipped. Vertices are assumed to be given in counter-clockwise cyclic order.

refsect1.title: HINTS
refsect1.para: A hole can be accommodated as a clockwise section connected to the periphery by a line segment traced in both directions.
Disjoint pieces may be connected by a line segment traced in both directions.

refsect1.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsect1.para: Improperly formatted input produces an error message and terminates cad_parea with non-zero exit status.
cad_parea outputs "0" for the area of a degenerate polygon.
